channel.title: Youth on The Guyana Brief
channel.description: Recent content in Youth on The Guyana Brief

item.title: De Boys Seh: Wha Speedeet & Wilar Talking About Dis Week
item.description: Speedeet and Wilar share dem thoughts on cricket, video games, school lunch, and why adults always saying ‘back in me days.’ Short takes from two 12-year-olds!

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar: De Mango Tree Incident
item.description: Speedeet got a plan fuh get de biggest mango from Mr. Chan shop yard, and Wilar know is trouble but he going anyway. Wha could go wrong?
